snippet: Stocks closed higher as investors awaited the key monthly jobs report on Friday.
abstract: Stocks rise one day ahead of November jobs report, as a rebound in shares of Apple bolsters the technology sector.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher as investors awaited the key monthly jobs report on Friday.

headline.main: Investors Trade Lightly Ahead of Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Investors Trade Lightly Ahead of Jobs Report
